name: Spreed - speed read the web
description: Train yourself to double or triple your reading speed, without sacrificing comprehension. Absorb knowledge, faster.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://connect.facebook.net https://*.uservoice.com https://cdn.firebase.com https://*.firebaseio.com; object-src 'self'
